lead_paragraph: THIRD DAY. The Convention met, pursuant to adjustment, at 9 o'clock. The attendance was very both of the Reverend the Clergy, and the Lay Delegates. The morning service was read by Rev. STEPHEN H. BATTIN, of Christ Church, Cooperstown, assisted by Rev. G. JARVIS, of Christ Church, Ballston Spa.
abstract: Chosen Prov. Bp of N. York
